Detailed Description

class for inserting and calculating basic web stats via database

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

getRawStats (   $start = null,
  $end = null,
  $fields = '*' 
)

gets complete raw stats for the range identified CAUTION!!! Keeping $start and $end as NULL will result in far too much data in most instances

Parameters
string $start start date
string $end end date
string $fields

getTotalDistinctIPs (   $start = null,
  $end = null 
)

gets the total number of distinct IP addresses (optionally: within a specified range)

Parameters
string $start start date
string $end end date
Returns
int
getTotalDistinctPages (   $start = null,
  $end = null 
)

gets the total number of distinct pages (optionally: within a specified range) The 'page' column is derived from $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] which means it only gets the actual page that was viewed, without the query string variables

Parameters
string $start start date
string $end end date
Returns
int
